title: Understanding the $$30-60-90$$ Triangle
text: In a $$30-60-90$$ triangle, the side opposite the 30° angle is always half the hypotenuse. This is a key property of this type of triangle.

title: Calculate the Side Opposite the 30° Angle
text: Given that the hypotenuse is $$10$$ units, calculate the length of the side opposite the 30° angle.
